attributes.title: Chile...anyways so
attributes.review: This app is very bad the design and everything it’s hard to see what’s going on in the app and it’s just filled with fake news and it’s just terrible.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app called me an ugly pig because I was a women, literly out of no where. You guys this app is terrible, and most of the complaints are true, like most of this stuff happend. This app is trash

attributes.title: DO NOT TRUST
attributes.review: This app is completely fake. The information that is put on this app by Donald Trump is fake and used to make him look good. If you want real news you’re better off going to Tik Tok

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: What a horrible app I would like to speak to the manager of whoever made this app. Our president deserves more than this! I will not be leaving a tip and I expect better service.

attributes.title: trump went to court for raping a little girl
attributes.review: if you support him you ARE a racist, maybe not because of your personal views, but since you support one you are perpetuating the problem.

attributes.title: Privacy Concerns
attributes.review: I didn’t like to even use this app you have to give so much of your personal data. This does not seem safe.

attributes.title: Very SCARY
attributes.review: A group of six karens came at me and told me to go to sleep early they harassed me they told me if you dont go to sleep 12 rats will jump you at the corner of 7-Eleven and i said hell no i told stop asking for god dam hair cuts 😍😍✨✨

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: Takes your phone number and email. Spam and asking for money.

attributes.title: Trump train
attributes.review: Has a 12 year old. I gathered my own info and research from my mom and other sources. Let’s just say this is fake news. Love the guy. But it’s a little obvious this is a scam.

attributes.title: Glitchy — is this even an authorized app?
attributes.review: I’ve been getting spam calls ever since I signed up through the app. Might be a fake?
